items.title: Meeting #1 - Prolegomena pt. 1
items.content_text:
For our first meeting we’ll be reading pages 1 - 31 (“Preface” through “Prolegomena General Question”) of Kant’s Prolegomena to Any Future Metaphysics.

Location: We’ll meet at Tatte Bakery & Cafe, Fenway and walk over Ramler park across the street.

Download
